column4: Can someone help me out understanding the installation of WoW-Wrath of the Lich King?

http://www.sysadminwiki.net/wiki/index.php?title=How_to_install_and_configure_World_of_Warcraft_in_Ubuntu_9.04 Those are the instuctions, but I mean. Do I just type what he typed in that box in the terminal without the $ and # signs?
People have been able to install wrath, but I just dont get those instructions. I switched over to Linux about a week ago, so I dont understand if I am to type the $ and # signs in the terminal?
no you don't, they are there just for your convenience
